subject: Business
title: Supplier Relationship Management
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Supplier Relationship Management.

hook.text: Walmart squeezes suppliers for the lowest price. Toyota shares profits and helps suppliers improve. Both are strategies.

buildup.text: Supplier relationships range from adversarial (lowest bid wins) to collaborative (joint planning and innovation).

discovery.text: Collaborative relationships unlock benefits neither side can achieve alone: shared R&D, faster innovation, risk pooling.

twist.text: Collaboration requires trust, which takes years to build and seconds to destroy with a broken promise.

climax.text: Toyota's supplier network is so loyal that during the 2011 tsunami, suppliers prioritized Toyota's orders above all.

punchline.text: Treat suppliers as partners and they'll move mountains for you.

quiz.question: What advantage does a collaborative supplier relationship offer?
options: Shared innovation, risk pooling, and priority treatment during crises
The lowest possible price on every order
Zero need for contracts or agreements
